main.name: Mathis Linger
main.description: After graduating from ENSAE Paris, I joined the data & AI lab of BNP Paribas CIB where we build AI products for bankers
main.bio: After graduating from ENSAE Paris, I started to work as a data scientist at BNP Paribas CIB, where most of my projects involve either NLP, recommender systems or computer vision. Aside of data science, I am also really interested in web development.

education.degree: MS in Data Science (awarded with high honours)
M.Sc in Statistics and Econometrics (awarded with highest honours)
B.Sc in Mathematics and Economics (awarded with highest honours)

work.company: BNP Paribas CIB, Data & AI Lab
work.title: Expert machine learning
work.description: Along the AI product we built, I mainly explored NLP, recommender systems and computer vision. I worked on the development of an internal OCR engine, for which I supervised interns, a news feed application as well as a recommender system in order to improve sales process. For all these projects, I also developed the full stack application. Besides, I was in charge of organizing the second edition of the BNP Paribas AI Summer School, a 2 days event gathering 22 academic speakers and 300 data experts.

work.title: Data Scientist, R&D team
work.description: The goal of this internship was to find the best way to cluster retailer’s products using users’ behaviors (pageviews, clicks ...). Methods investigated include embedding computations, spectral clustering and affinity propagation algorithm. I also worked on the existing predictive models, by tuning model’s features to improve performances and investigating predictive anomalies.

testimonials.text: Remember to look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see and wonder about what makes the universe exist. Be curious. And however difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at. It matters that you don't just give up.
